title: Bucks’ Success Paramount to Deer District Restart
itunes:title: Bucks’ Success Paramount to Deer District Restart
description:
The Milwaukee Bucks are one game away from securing a spot in the NBA Finals. Peter Feigin, Milwaukee Bucks President joins Jason, Barr, and Lynch to discuss their spellbinding playoff run, what the team’s success means for the city, the staffing challenges brought on by the pandemic, and the evolution and energy of the Deer District.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
